    • Method Detail

      • encodeArgumentTest

        @Test
void encodeArgumentTest()
        Checking the correctness of the operation of the encodeArgument method of the WebCrawler class. This method decodes the input string and sets the values of the class fields in accordance with the decoding result.

      • checkArgumentTest

        @Test
void checkArgumentTest()
        Checking the correctness of the operation of the checkArgument method of the WebCrawler class. This method checks the validity of the class fields set by the encodeArgument function.

      • CheckFilesContext

        void CheckFilesContext(java.lang.String ActFileName,
                       java.lang.String ExpFileName)
                throws java.io.IOException
        The function compares the files passed as parameters if the files do not match throws IOException.
        Parameters:
        ActFileName - Reference file (file 1)
        ExpFileName - Comparison file (file 2)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if files do not match
